componentAttributes.richTextValue:
Vigilant - Valorant Strategy


Vigilant is a mobile app that allows users to create and save strategy with interactive maps for the first person shooter Valorant. In anticipation for the game's upcoming release in June 2020, a few friends spawned the idea of developing a mobile companion app for the game. The thought initally was to create a stat traking app to analyze your gameplay. However, the APIs to tap into such data the game tracks were not made public until months after the game released. Even then, you have to submit an application outlining how your applicaiton would consume the API; only a handful of applications have been approved at the time of writing this (November 2020). Thus, I pivoted early on to focus on a strategy based app that allows you to create strategy by placing player markers and abilities on the game's various maps.

Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.projectvalorapp

Apple: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/vigilant-valorant-strategy/id1521166919?ign-mpt=uo%3D4
